name: MEMORY SPACE UPDATE
description: This is a TAS Professional 3.0 command here for compatibility. There is no preferred TAS Professional 5.1 command/function.
syntax: MEM_SPC mem_area# START start_val STOP stop_val NCHR #_of_chrs DOwhat_to_do

parameters.name: mem_area#
parameters.description: This is the memory area to use. This must resolve to a value of 1 through 4.

parameters.name: start_val
parameters.description: The character position of the beginning of the block of characters. The first character in the memory area is at position 1.

parameters.name: stop_val
parameters.description: The character position of the end of the block of characters.

parameters.name: NCHR #_of_chrs
parameters.description: Number of characters to add or subtract.

parameters.name: DOwhat_to_do
parameters.description: This must resolve to either A (add) or S (subtract).

comments: This is the equivalent of the TAS Professional 3.0 command Memory Space Update.
